content: two simple men s hat patterns that work up quickly and are great for donating to shelters and organizations that help the needy caron one pound is a thicker worsted weight yarn so keep that in mind if you decide to substitute the solid colored hat comes in 5 sizes and the multi-colored hat comes in 2 sizes *this crochet pattern is available for free on my website or you can download it here as a print-optimized ad-free pdf for your convenience * **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 5 5mm i hook or hook needed to obtain gauge option 1 150-175 yards #4 worsted weight caron one pound yarn in 3 colors option 2 125-165 yards #4 worsted weight caron one pound in 1 color scissors yarn needle optional leather tag **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet fphdc = front post half_double_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet blo = back loop only fpsc = front post single_crochet bpsc = back post single_crochet st/sts = stitch/stitches **gauge ** hat option #1 6 1/2 across after round 8 7 across after round 9 hat option #2 6 3/4 across after round 8 12 half_double_crochet in 4 **additional notes ** -chain 1 does not count as a stitch -the colors are carried down inside of the hat instead of cutting each round that way there s not as many ends to weave in later -see pattern for notes on sizing/measurements
